Field2: A simply daily moisturizer
Field3:
I am a mid-thirties male, and I purchased this mostly because I wanted a simple, non-greasy moisturizes for days when my skin - mostly my arms - are a bit dry. CeraVe has proved adequate to the task, though it is still just a little oily in that I can feel it on the skin after it has dried, or been absorbed, or whatever it does.

As anyone can see, the moisturizer market is enormous and diverse beyond measure, and I didn't want to get into a long process of research to find the best one. Nor did I want a moisturizer marketed just for men or one which needs to be paired with three other products to be effective, or has a place in a lengthy twice-a-day skincare routine. I just wanted a simple, relatively inexpensive lotion for occasional use.

This works well enough. You get plenty in the bottle, it moistens dry skin, it doesn't have a particularly notable smell. It isn't oily, but I can still sort of feel it on my skin even after it has been 20m, so I may need to look at least a little further to find something that isn't like that, but this sufficient for my purposes.
